SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT reply_num,
REPLACE(REPLACE(reply_content,'<','<'),'>','>') reply_content,
reply_date, club_num, mem_num, nickname FROM club_reply JOIN member USING(mem_num) WHERE club_num = #{club_num} ORDER BY reply_num DESC)a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}

REPLACE(REPLACE(rereply_content,'<','<'),'>','>') rereply_content,
rereply_date, club_num, mem_num, reply_num, nickname FROM club_rereply JOIN member USING(mem_num) WHERE club_num = #{club_num} ORDER BY rereply_num DESC)a)
